text: @realDonaldTrump Every time you talk you lose votes and I voted for you but I'm voting for Joe Sleepy Joe 2020. Voting for you is the dumbest thing I've ever done in my life.  WPAT =Worst President All Time 🤔🦆🦆🦆🦆🦆🦆🦆🤔. Are those 15 cases of coronavirus down to zero yet 🤔🦆🦆🦆🦆🦆
